Text:
wow!

this looks great - thanks

*patiently waits for seeds*

You're welcome. My internet connection can be a little iffy at times, but now I'm having reasonably good upload speed (~250 kb/s). I will seed until there are other seeders.

Darn, 'Edit' is 'temporarily disabled.' I forgot to put French in languages, Eddie performed 'Dress To Circle' in Paris in French.

think all eddie izzard fans know about the show he did in french. 
been wanting to see how that show went. often heard about it, but never had a chance to see it 'til now.

merci!
Does that mean Counterstrike? No, I don't.

The quality varies but some of these are really old so to be expected,
also coming from 1080 hi def screen PoV.
A=10
V=6-8

But the sound is great some have subtitles but these just need to be turned off. 
As always Eddie is hilarious and i recommend this as it is a very complete collection of his shows.
